sqlMap.select: select yh.XTYHID, yh.YHM from T_SYS_XTYH yh, BASE_AREA_CHRG ach, BASE_AREA area where yh.xtyhid = ach.chrg_no and ach.area_id = area.area_id and area.area_id = #AREA_ID# and ach.JOB = '区域经理'
select yh.XTYHID, yh.YHM from T_SYS_XTYH yh, BASE_AREA_CHRG ach, BASE_AREA area where yh.xtyhid = ach.chrg_no and ach.area_id = area.area_id and area.area_id = #AREA_ID# and ach.JOB = '区域总监'
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_CMPL_ADVS( CMPL_ADVS_ID, CMPL_ADVS_NO, CMPL_ADVS_TITLE, CMPL_ADVS_TYPE, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, RAISE_PSON_NAME, TEL, STATE, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, AREA_CHIEF_ID, AREA_CHIEF_NAME, RAISE_TIME, APPOINT_PSON_ID, EMG_LVL, PROV, ADVS_SOURCE, CUSTOMER_TEL, CUSTOMER_NAME )values( #CMPL_ADVS_ID#, #CMPL_ADVS_NO#, #CMPL_ADVS_TITLE#, #CMPL_ADVS_TYPE#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #AREA_NO#, #AREA_NAME#, #RAISE_PSON_NAME#, #TEL#, #STATE#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #AREA_MANAGE_ID#, #AREA_MANAGE_NAME#, #AREA_CHIEF_ID#, #AREA_CHIEF_NAME#, sysdate, #APPOINT_PSON_ID#, #EMG_LVL#, #PROV#, #ADVS_SOURCE#, #CUSTOMER_TEL#, #CUSTOMER_NAME# )

insert into DRP_CMPL_PRD_DTL( CMPL_PRD_DTL_ID, CMPL_ADVS_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_PROBLEM_TYPE, REMARK, PRD_ATT, DEL_FLAG, USE_TIME, SHIP_POINT_NO, SHIP_POINT_ID, SHIP_POINT_NAME, PRDC_DATE, BUY_DATE, PRD_TYPE, PRD_NUM )values( #CMPL_PRD_DTL_ID#, #CMPL_ADVS_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_PROBLEM_TYPE#, #REMARK#, #PRD_ATT#, #DEL_FLAG#, #USE_TIME#, #SHIP_POINT_NO#, #SHIP_POINT_ID#, #SHIP_POINT_NAME#, to_date(#PRDC_DATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#BUY_DATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #PRD_TYPE#, #PRD_NUM# )

insert into DRP_CMPL_ADVS( CMPL_ADVS_ID, CMPL_ADVS_NO, CMPL_ADVS_TITLE, CMPL_ADVS_TYPE, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, RAISE_PSON_NAME, TEL, CMPL_OBJ, CMPL_TO_PSON, CMPL_ADVS_CONTENT, STATE, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, AREA_CHIEF_ID, AREA_CHIEF_NAME, RAISE_TIME, APPOINT_PSON_ID, EMG_LVL )values( #CMPL_ADVS_ID#, #CMPL_ADVS_NO#, #CMPL_ADVS_TITLE#, #CMPL_ADVS_TYPE#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #AREA_NO#, #AREA_NAME#, #RAISE_PSON_NAME#, #TEL#, #CMPL_OBJ#, #CMPL_TO_PSON#, #CMPL_ADVS_CONTENT#, #STATE#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #AREA_MANAGE_ID#, #AREA_MANAGE_NAME#, #AREA_CHIEF_ID#, #AREA_CHIEF_NAME#, sysdate, #APPOINT_PSON_ID#, #EMG_LVL# )

insert into DRP_CMPL_ADVS( CMPL_ADVS_ID, CMPL_ADVS_NO, CMPL_ADVS_TITLE, CMPL_ADVS_TYPE, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, RAISE_PSON_NAME, TEL, ADVS_TYPE, ADVS_SMMRY, CMPL_ADVS_CONTENT, STATE, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, AREA_CHIEF_ID, AREA_CHIEF_NAME, RAISE_TIME, APPOINT_PSON_ID )values( #CMPL_ADVS_ID#, #CMPL_ADVS_NO#, #CMPL_ADVS_TITLE#, #CMPL_ADVS_TYPE#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #AREA_NO#, #AREA_NAME#, #RAISE_PSON_NAME#, #TEL#, #ADVS_TYPE#, #ADVS_SMMRY#, #CMPL_ADVS_CONTENT#, #STATE#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #AREA_MANAGE_ID#, #AREA_MANAGE_NAME#, #AREA_CHIEF_ID#, #AREA_CHIEF_NAME#, sysdate, #APPOINT_PSON_ID# )

insert into DRP_CMPL_ADVS_TRACE( DRP_CMPL_ADVS_TRACE_ID, CMPL_ADVS_ID, DEAL_PSON_ID, DEAL_PSON_NAME, DEAL_TIME, FEEDBACK_INFO, STATE )values( #DRP_CMPL_ADVS_TRACE_ID#, #CMPL_ADVS_ID#, #DEAL_PSON_ID#, #DEAL_PSON_NAME#, sysdate, #FEEDBACK_INFO#, #STATE# )
